alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 18 at 3:04PM EST until November 18 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulation around 2 to 4 inches. The heaviest snow amounts are most likely along and west of Keysers Ridge. * WHERE...Garrett County. * WHEN...Until 9 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of snow squalls is possible late this afternoon and early evening, most likely between 4 PM and 7 PM. Visibility will be reduced to around one quarter mile or less along with strong winds around 20 to 35 mph and quick snowfall accumulations around an additional inch or two within an hour.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
